title: Drawing, "Design for Occasional Table", 1934
inscribed:
Lower left: trademark JB
Lower right (in margin): N.Y. Jan 27th 1934/ JB (initials)
Center: letters Jan 29 1934
Lowe right: .B.108/.OCCASIONAL TABLE./.L: 29 1/4" H: 30." D: 10 1/2" 
[dimensions listed]
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Occasional table consisting of a base, a horizontal case with four corners, two vertical cases to form a step-like modular unit.  Two circular dishes are seen, upper right and lower left, possibly ashtrays.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Occasional Table", 1934.
1934. Graphite on tracing paper. Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 2003-15-3.
